citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:23 PM on
08/29/2024. The inspector established contacted with the licensee by phone. However, the licensee could not provide a
representative to meet the inspector at the facility until 5:30 PM. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:23 PM on 
08/29/2024. The inspector established contacted with the licensee by phone. However, the licensee could not provide a 
representative to meet the inspector at the facility until 5:30 PM. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and 
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
End Section
